What preparation is needed for this Chec: Fasting is required for about 10 - 12 hours before the sample collection. Consumption of water is permitted.
Who should book this checkup?: Sexual health problems are highly prevalent in India, with 80% of Indian men reporting at least one sexual health problem. Sexual health problems are strongly associated with stress, anxiety, smoking, consuming alcohol, chewing tobacco, diabetes, hypertension, and heart problems.
